data.title: Crime
data.meta_description: DVD Studio featuring classic TV shows such as Cagney & Lacey, In Search Of.. Leonard Nimoy, Diagnosis Murder.
data.text:
Viper - The Complete Collection - all 4 seasons, 80 episodes, includes The Pilot [DVD] 7058

$29.99 USD

All 4 seasons, 80 episodes, includes The Pilo t Viper was an action-adventure TV series about a secretive task force set up by the federal government to fight crime in the fictional city of Metro City, California, that is perpetually under siege from one crime wave after another. Matt Houston - The Complete Collection [DVD] #7029

$29.99 USD

Matt Houston stars Lee Horsley as a wealthy mustachioed Texas oilman named Matlock "Matt" Houston who worked as a private investigator in Los Angeles in his abundant free time. The show also stars Pamela Hensley as his lawyer sidekick, C.J., and George Wyner as his continuously frustrated business manager. During the show's third and final seas...

Hunter: The Complete Series [DVD] #7188

$49.99 USD

Includes 7 Seasons, 152 Episodes, plus The TV Movie: The Return of Hunter Breaking all the rules has never been so much fun! Take a hardnosed, strong-willed, undercover cop outraged by crime and the loopholes an the United States justice system and team him up with a sexy, no-nonsense policewoman whose unorthodox tactics sometimes rival his own...

Dan August - The Complete Collection [DVD] #7109

$16.99 USD

Includes all 26 episodes Burt Reynolds earned a Golden Globe® nomination for his role as Lt. Detective Dan August. Investigating homicide-after-homicide in his hometown of Santa Luisa, California, August works with (and against) people with whom he grew up. The Division - The Complete Collection [DVD] #7053

All 4 seasons, 88 Episodes The Division is an American crime drama television series created by Deborah Joy LeVine and starring Bonnie Bedelia. The series focused on a team of women police officers in the San Francisco Police Department. Storylines revolved around the women's personal and professional lives, and their attempts to balance both. T...

5 seasons, 110 episodes Lorenzo Lamas returns as Reno Raines, a good cop framed for murder by the corrupt cops he’d testified against.
